Title: Expands the scope of management and operations audits of gas and electric corporations conducted by the public service commission
Summary: Expands the scope of management and operations audits of gas and electric corporations conducted by the public service commission; requires copies of such audits to be provided to the governor and various legislative leaders.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the management and operations audits of certain utilities
